tool.name: dada2: sequence counts
tool.help:
Description ...........
Get the counts of sequences per sample for the different stages of the dada pipeline.
Usage .....
**Inputs:**
Any number of results of dada2 steps in the following form: - a collection of results from dada, or mergePairs; or the collection of statistics from filterAndTrim (the identifiers of the collection elements are used as sample names) - the result of makeSequenceTable or removeBimeraDenovo
**Output:**
A table containing the number of sequences per sample (rows) for each input (columns)
Details .......
For results from
- dada, and mergePairs the sum of the result of dada2's getUniques function is used - makeSequenceTable, and removeBimeraDenovo R's rowSums function is used
